_workflow_explanation.description: Add VLAN interface(s) to an existing bond
_workflow_explanation.step_1: add_vlan_to_bond: Creates VLAN interface(s) on the specified bond
_workflow_explanation.note: The bond must already exist. Use 'create_bond' action first if needed
_workflow_explanation.subnet_auto_config: Automatically links each VLAN interface to its subnet

vlan_configs.vlan_ids: Single VLAN ID (int) or list of VLAN IDs [int, int, ...]
vlan_configs.ip_address: Static IP address if ip_mode is 'static' (optional)
